name: All of Them
description:
You're having an unexpected encounter with the beyond. You get introduced to an unknown world and learn how to master its ways. Background

All of Them is an entry for the Bite Sized Horror Game Jam 2018, which secret theme was "beyond". The initial idea was to get introduced by "the beyond" into minigames that portray different philosophical viewpoints. I ran out of time during the jam but will finish it up coming weeks.

Assets

Programming: Done with Phaser.io
Graphics: Created with Adobe Photoshop
Sounds: Created with FL Studio
Fonts: Basic Comical, Dimbo, Dosis, Oswald

Join us on discord:  Game Jam General
